reviewText: This is a wonderful series that shows the great Nelson Rodrigues at his best in a collector's package. A must-have!

"A Vida Como Ela " or The Life as it really is, is a great collection of short stories. The actors participate in each story and share one part of what the author considers to be a 'normal life'. Some stories have a good ending but mostly they have a less than fairy tale ending that often ends in tragically.
